en: As the project becomes more and more "official," you start to feel a little sad. This has been your baby for so long and now that the fixes are adding up, it feels a bit less like it's yours.
Then something occurs to you - why not include an 'easter egg'? Only you will ever know it's there.
You add an easter egg of an inside joke between you and Takashi. You doubt anyone will discover such a silly thing, but it makes you happy.
No, no. There's actual work to be done - you shouldn't be goofing off.
